summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 15285 entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Forest Street, from Seventeenth Avenue South to Twenty-third Avenue South; Twenty-third Avenue South from Forest Street to Lander Street; and Lander Street, from Twenty-first Avenue South to Twenty-third Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 411 of the of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
